item.title: Rock Band Simulator
item.description:
Ever dreamed being a rock star? Rock Band Sim gives you the possibility of taking a look over it.

From accepting penny-rewarding gigs to get the initial hype and money for the first recordings to the biggest arenas of the country, wherever real rock stars do, you can do it here!

You’ll also have a guitar-hero kind of mini-game for the gigs and recordings, it might become a bit boring after a whole hour playing the game, but I will leave it for you to decide! Begin by taking the smaller gigs and writing some songs and as soon as you have a couple of 4 star musics think about recording them. You might prefer the 800 dollar studio for each of the musics so you don’t loose it’s rating from the recording process.

As you keep playing begin buying new instruments for your players, this will give a fast increase of skills for the band’s members and improve the results of recordings and gigs.

You have available PR campaigns as well, use them after releasing a new album as your budget allows it.

And take care not to waste all of your money, if you’re not selling albums or singles so that you don’t have to do the small venues gigs to have enough money to return for the bigger ones.

 

Begin by taking the smaller gigs and writing some songs and as soon as you have a couple of 4 star musics think about recording them.

You might prefer the 800 dollar studio for each of the musics so you don’t loose it’s rating from the recording process. As you keep playing begin buying new instruments for your players, this will give a fast increase of skills for the band’s members and improve the results of recordings and gigs.

You have available PR campaigns as well, use them after releasing a new album as your budget allows it.

And take care not to waste all of your money, if you’re not selling albums or singles so that you don’t have to do the small venues gigs to have enough money to return for the bigger ones.
